Hi.  I have a JUnit 4 TestCase, let's call it MyTestCase.  I want to initia=
lize some state once prior to running any of MyTestCase's tests.  I see my =
options are to give MyTestCase some static attributes and initialize them w=
ith @BeforeClass or to give MyTestCase some instance attributes and initial=
ize them with MyTestCase's constructor.  

Any recommendations for one appr=
oach over the other?

Thanks!

Ken
